abstract.para: A hands-on introductory tutorial to monadic parsers using the Haskell Programming Language . Students will require an installation of the Glasgow Haskell Compiler and a text editor. Upon completion of the tutorial students will have created a parser library.
Students will be expected to have a basic understanding of Haskell syntax and familiarity with tools -- in particular, the GHC interpreter (GHCi).
